photographer.name: Rahul Sharma
photographer.bio: Award-winning professional photographer and cinematic videographer with over 10 years of experience. Specializing in weddings, travel, sports, and commercial photography. Based in Mumbai, serving clients across India and internationally.

location.address: 123 Photography Lane, Bandra West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400050

photographer.style: My photography style blends documentary authenticity with artistic elegance. I capture genuine emotions and moments that tell your unique story. Whether it's a wedding, a travel adventure, or a commercial shoot, I bring a cinematic eye to every frame.

seo.defaultTitle: Professional Photography & Videography Services | Sharma Visual Arts
seo.defaultDescription: Award-winning photographer and videographer specializing in weddings, travel, sports, events, portraits, and product photography. Serving Mumbai, Maharashtra and all across India.
seo.keywords: photographer Mumbai, videographer Mumbai, wedding photographer India, travel photography, sports photography, event photography, portrait photography, product photography, Mumbai photographer, Maharashtra photographer, Indian wedding photographer
